definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: 3 mpl., prob. denom. fr. [[לֶקֶשׁ]] = take the aftermath, i.e. take everything (Wetzst in De:Hiob 26:6) (> Buhl II. [[לקשׁ]], cf. Ar. laqa3a schnell zusammenraffen [cf. Lane:2668]) ;—despoil; :[[וְכֶרֶם רָשָׁע יְלַקֵּֽשׁוּ ]] Job 24:6 and the vineyard of the wicked (but rd. prob. [[עָשִׁיר]] the rich Bu Du) they despoil (‖[[קָחַר]]).
